trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una singola cella in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe oggetto DataGridViewCell rappresenta una singola cella in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare le celle mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>raccolta di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: La riga e colonna per un oggetto DataGridViewCell identificare la posizione della cella in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: Solitamente una cella contiene dati specifici per la riga e colonna in cui è contenuta.

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: La cella può essere personalizzata in modi diversi impostando le proprietà e gestione degli eventi associati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>assegnato per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare l'istanza restituita da questo metodo, eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>è attualmente assegnato al controllo, viene creata una nuova istanza di uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da ottenere o impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>proprietà, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento al `Accessibility` assembly installato con il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti accessibili, vedere la sezione "Active Accessibility" di MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>assegnato per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Modifica lo stile del bordo di cella di input in base ai criteri specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo chiama internamente il metodo AdjustCellBorderStyle per determinare l'aspetto dei bordi della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo utilizza in genere il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>proprietà per il `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parametro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>valore non è supportato come stile di input per le celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> che rappresenta lo stile del bordo di cella da modificare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> che viene utilizzato per archiviare le modifiche intermedie apportate allo stile del bordo della cella.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per aggiungere un bordo verticale alla cella. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per aggiungere un bordo orizzontale alla cella. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cella ospitante è nella prima colonna visibile. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cella ospitante è nella prima riga visibile. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Modificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta le larghezze di tutti i margini di cella.

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza predefinita del bordo della cella è&1; pixel.

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la seguente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>i valori per modificare la larghezza del bordo: - il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valore denota una larghezza pari a 0 pixel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valori aumentano la larghezza predefinita di 1 pixel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>proprietà è impostata per la riga della cella appartiene, l'altezza del rettangolo viene aumentato il valore del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>proprietà è impostata per la colonna della cella proprietario, della larghezza del rettangolo viene incrementata dal valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> che devono essere calcolati per i margini.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta le larghezze di tutti i margini di cella.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la riga della cella verrà annullata quando si fa clic sulla cella.

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ClickUnsharesRow viene chiamato appena prima di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Deve restituire `true` se la chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>ha l'effetto della condivisione della riga della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla condivisione, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> contenente i dati passati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga verrà annullata la condivisione, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta della cella.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Sostituire il metodo Clone ogni volta che si deriva dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>classe e aggiungere nuove proprietà per la classe derivata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il duplicato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di colonna della cella.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di colonna per la riga che contiene le intestazioni di riga ha un valore di -1.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della colonna che contiene la cella; -1 se la cella non è contenuta all'interno di una colonna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il rettangolo di delimitazione che racchiude l'area del contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo restituito riporta le coordinate client, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>metodo per ottenere il relativo valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Per la base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>tipo, questo valore è <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere il rettangolo di delimitazione di cella anziché il contenuto della cella, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che delimita il contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: La riga contenente la cella è una riga condivisa.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - la cella è una cella di intestazione di colonna.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>proprietà è minore di 0, che indica che la cella è una cella di intestazione di riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la riga della cella verrà annullata quando si fa clic sul contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The ContentClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ContentClickUnsharesRow viene chiamato appena prima di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Deve restituire `true` se la chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>ha l'effetto della condivisione della riga della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla condivisione, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> contenente i dati passati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga verrà annullata la condivisione, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: La base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la riga della cella verrà annullata quando si fa doppio clic il contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow viene chiamato appena prima di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Deve restituire `true` se la chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>ha l'effetto della condivisione della riga della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla condivisione, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> contenente i dati passati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga verrà annullata la condivisione, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il menu di scelta rapida associato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica il menu di scelta rapida che viene in genere visualizzato quando l'utente fa clic sulla cella.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>proprietà è impostata o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà `true`, ottenere il valore della proprietà ContextMenuStrip genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento del controllo e restituisce il valore del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà come specificato nel gestore eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se esistono gestori per l'evento, ottenere il valore della proprietà ContextMenuStrip restituisce il valore specificato in precedenza o il valore predefinito di `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: La gestione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento risulta particolarmente utile quando si lavora con grandi quantità di dati per evitare effetti negativi sulle prestazioni durante l'impostazione del valore di ContextMenuStrip per più celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: La modifica di questa proprietà genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>eventi sull'oggetto di appartenenza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se presente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile specificare i menu di scelta rapida per le singole righe anziché le singole celle impostando la riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà o la gestione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>del controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell ContextMenuStrip property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione della proprietà ContextMenuStrip cella esegue l'override della riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>impostazione della proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento esegue l'override di entrambi i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento e la riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>l'impostazione della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare `null` per un menu di scelta rapida cella, tuttavia, per impedire l'override di un menu di scelta rapida della riga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto accessibile per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se non si chiama in modo esplicito il metodo CreateAccessibilityInstance, verrà chiamato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>riferimento alla proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Da ottenere o impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, è necessario aggiungere un riferimento di `Accessibility` assembly installato con il [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value for a cell in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore predefinito per una cella nella riga per nuovi record.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultNewRowValue property in the base class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DefaultNewRowValue nella classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>restituisce sempre `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: However, this property can be overridden in derived cell classes to return other default values.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questa proprietà può essere sottoposto a override in classi di cella derivata per restituire altri valori predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is displayed if the cell is in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito da questa proprietà viene visualizzato se la cella nella riga per nuovi record.

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName> event when focus enters the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore può essere sostituito da un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>evento quando lo stato attivo passa la riga per nuovi record.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the default value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore predefinito.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la cella del controllo di modifica dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> calls this method when the current cell hosts an editing control and editing mode ends.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>chiama questo metodo quando la cella corrente contiene un controllo di modifica e termina in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>, and then removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo rimuove il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>e quindi rimosso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This cell is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questa cella non è associata un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> has a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - o - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>proprietà dell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ha un valore di <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: This is the case, for example, when the control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Questo avviene, ad esempio, quando il controllo non è in modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la cella attualmente visualizzata sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether a particular cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare se una cella specifica è si schermo.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A> property value is `false`, this property will return `false` as well.
trans-unit.target: Se la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>valore della proprietà è `false`, questa proprietà restituirà `false` nonché.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cella è visualizzata interamente o parzialmente su schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la riga della cella verrà annullata quando si fa doppio clic sulla cella.

trans-unit.source: The DoubleClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo DoubleClickUnsharesRow viene chiamato appena prima di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Deve restituire `true` se la chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>ha l'effetto della condivisione della riga della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla condivisione, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> contenente i dati passati al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga verrà annullata la condivisione, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore formattato corrente della cella, indipendentemente dal fatto che la cella sia in modalità di modifica e il valore non è stato eseguito il commit.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce il valore corrente della cella o di controllo di modifica se la cella si trova in modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, ottenere il valore di questa proprietà converte il valore di cella in un valore di tipo indicato dalla visualizzazione equivalente di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Questo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento, è possibile gestire per personalizzare la conversione del valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se ha esito negativo, la formattazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se è presente alcun gestore per l'evento o il gestore imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`, viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore formattato corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: La riga contenente la cella è una riga condivisa.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - la cella è una cella di intestazione di colonna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>è minore di 0, che indica che la cella è una cella di intestazione di riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formattazione non è riuscita e non esiste alcun gestore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo oppure il gestore ha impostato la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto eccezione può in genere possibile eseguire il cast nel tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo di modifica contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Un tipo di cella derivata esegue l'override di questa proprietà per restituire il tipo di controllo di modifica contenuto.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an editing control, as with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, the EditType property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se la cella non dispone di un controllo di modifica, come con <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, la proprietà restituisce EditType `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"> </xref> tipo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se verrà annullata la riga padre quando lo stato attivo passa alla cella.

trans-unit.source: The EnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo EnterUnsharesRow viene chiamato appena prima di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Deve restituire `true` se la chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>ha l'effetto di condivisione della riga contenente la cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla condivisione, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga padre della cella.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un'azione utente spostato lo stato attivo alla cella. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se un'operazione a livello di codice ha spostato lo stato attivo alla cella.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga verrà annullata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the error icon for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i limiti dell'icona di errore per la cella.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo restituito riporta le coordinate client, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Per la base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>tipo, questo valore è sempre <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo che descrive una condizione di errore associata alla cella.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, la proprietà di ErrorText viene utilizzata quando si gestisce l' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>evento di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della cella non riesce ad alcuni criteri di convalida, impostare la proprietà ErrorText e annullare l'operazione di commit impostando il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>a `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: Il testo specificato viene quindi visualizzato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, e l'utente viene richiesto di risolvere l'errore nei dati della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>è `true`, è possibile fornire il testo di errore per le righe e celle utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando si assegna un'altra stringa ErrorText di una cella, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo viene generato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: A partire da .NET Framework 4.5.2, il ridimensionamento dell'icona di errore è determinato dall'impostazione DPI di sistema quando il file app. config contiene la voce seguente:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il testo che descrive una condizione di errore associata alla cella.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite ed esegue altre operazioni di pulizia prima che il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> venga recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>metodo con `false` come parametro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non deve chiamare questo metodo. un oggetto `Finalize` metodo viene richiamato automaticamente durante l'operazione di garbage collection, a meno che la finalizzazione del garbage collector non è stata disabilitata da una chiamata al <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [metodi Finalize e distruttori](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della cella formattato per la visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>proprietà è l'oggetto dati effettivo contenuto nella cella, mentre la rappresentazione formattata di questo oggetto FormattedValue.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà corrispondono ai tipi di dati di questi valori, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere il valore di questa proprietà chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>metodo per convertire il valore di cella in un valore di tipo indicato dalla visualizzazione equivalente di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Questo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento, è possibile gestire per personalizzare la conversione del valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se ha esito negativo, la formattazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se è presente alcun gestore per l'evento o il gestore imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`, viene generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Il valore formattato della cella o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se la cella non appartiene a un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>è minore di 0, che indica che la cella è una cella di intestazione di riga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: La riga contenente la cella è una riga condivisa.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - la cella è una cella di intestazione di colonna.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formattazione non è riuscita e non esiste alcun gestore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo oppure il gestore ha impostato la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.target: L'oggetto eccezione può in genere possibile eseguire il cast nel tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo del valore formattato associato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>proprietà è l'oggetto dati effettivo contenuto nella cella, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>proprietà è la rappresentazione dei dati formattata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>e proprietà FormattedValueType corrispondono ai tipi di dati di questi valori, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il tipo della cella del valore formattato.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la cella è bloccata.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà Frozen dipende dallo stato della riga padre della cella e della colonna.

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se il `Frozen` di riga o colonna è impostata su `true`, sarà anche la proprietà della cella Frozen `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cella è bloccata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il valore formattato della cella in cui copiare la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per recuperare un valore con formato degli Appunti che rappresenta il valore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della cella viene prima recuperato nel formato di visualizzazione dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può generare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento per formattare il valore e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento se la formattazione ha esito negativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: I parametri correlati alla posizione di questo metodo indicano dove si trova la cella nella tabella di dati che rappresenta l'area definita dalle celle selezionate nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: A seconda della posizione della cella, informazioni aggiuntive sulla formattazione possono essere restituiti da questo metodo insieme al valore della cella formattato visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il formato HTML per una cella nella prima colonna di una riga includerà il tag che indica l'inizio di una riga.

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I formati degli Appunti supportati includono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero della riga contenente la cella.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è nella prima riga dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che la cella è nell'ultima riga dell'area definita dalle celle selezionate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo viene chiamato, viene calcolata in modo dinamico le dimensioni del contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: La classe di base implementazione restituisce sempre <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The specified rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo chiama questo metodo per convertire un valore di cella in un valore di tipo indicato dalla visualizzazione equivalente di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo passa il valore di cella per questo metodo nel `value` parametro.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Un gestore per questo evento può modificare sia il `value` e `cellStyle` parametri.

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: Se il gestore non è impostato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`, tuttavia, questo metodo formatta `value` utilizzando le proprietà di formattazione il `cellStyle` oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not convert `value` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value for values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo non converte `value` per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore della proprietà per i valori uguali al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà valore quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>o `null`.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, è possibile gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento per visualizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere l'esempio di codice in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the inherited shortcut menu for the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il menu di scelta rapida ereditato per la cella corrente.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, it will inherit one from its parents, using the following precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: Se la cella non è associato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, erediterà uno dai relativi padri, l'ordine di precedenza seguente: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: This cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> 2.
trans-unit.target: Questa cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>2.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The owning row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 3.
trans-unit.target: La riga di appartenenza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>3.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The owning column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 4.
trans-unit.target: La colonna di appartenenza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The parent table's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName> Shortcut menus are Microsoft Windows native resources whose lifetimes are typically directed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method or the destructor.
trans-unit.target: La tabella padre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName>menu di scelta rapida sono risorse native di Microsoft Windows la cui durata viene in genere diretti tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>metodo o il distruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Pass the GetInheritedContextMenuStrip method the row index you used to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
